channel.title: Backend Developer on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference
channel.description: Recent content in Backend Developer on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference

item.title: Job Opening: OONI Backend Developer
item.description:
Are you a backend developer interested in defending human rights on the internet? We have a job opening for you!

The OONI team (a non-profit measuring internet censorship globally) is looking for a dedicated Backend Developer to work on our backend components and infrastructure, and to provide OONI data analysis support for our research efforts.

Job description

By joining our team, you will work on OONIâ€™s backend components, ensuring the stable and reliable performance of our infrastructure in response to the growing global coverage of measurements. You will also provide OONI data analysis support for OONI research reports and in support of the research of our partners.
